pr_title: Hide email sender field for Alert Notifications

timeline.message:
Show test notification field after type selected

In order to test a notification the user must select a type first, so it
is better to hide the field away until a notification type was selected.

Make email notification sender optional

The server already uses the sender configured in the config file as
default, so make this field optional.

Hide email notification sender in cloud

Fixes Graylog2/graylog-plugin-cloud#576
Hide legacy email alarm callback's sender in cloud

timeline.bodyText: This is actually dead code. But it doesn't hurt to do that here as well
timeline.author: mpfz0r

replies.bodyText: Indeed, it seems it will go away in 4.1. Until then someone could still create those through the UI I guess, so better safe than sorry :)
